seo_keywords: Roborock Q Revo mop not spinning
Roborock Q Revo bag full error

problems.title: Mops Not Spinning / Falling Off
problems.description: The round mop pads aren't rotating or detach during cleaning.
possible_causes: Debris in the mop motor shaft
solution_steps: Pull off the magnetic mop pads.
Clean hair from the hexagonal shaft.
Ensure the pads click firmly back into place.

problems.title: Dock Tray Overflowing / Not Washing
problems.description: Water pools in the dock base.
solution_steps: Remove the cleaning tray from the base (it pulls out).
Rinse the mesh filter on the tray.
Ensure the dirty water tank lid is sealed tight.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a Q Revo?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $420 vacuum, and extending the life of your Roborock is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Q Revo needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include intermittent power and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my Q Revo myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
